name: The Tornados
description: '''The Tornados''' were an English [[instrumental rock]] group of the 1960s that acted as backing group for many of record producer [[Joe Meek]]'s productions and also for singer [[Billy Fury]]. They enjoyed several chart hits in their own right, including the UK and US no. 1 "[[Telstar (instrumental)|Telstar]]" (named after the satellite and composed and produced by Meek), the first US no. 1 single by a British group.
